Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerReleted

Class Codex

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.playerReleted.Codex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Codex extends Object implements Serializable
Class that represents the codex of a player, the board to which the player can add cards
See Also:

      Returns:
      th map of collectables

    • setEarnedCollectables

      public void setEarnedCollectables(Collectable collectable, int number)
      update the hash with the current writing material or resources contained in the codex
      Parameters:
      collectable - determines what collectable's value to update
      number - define the amount of that type of collectable present in the codex
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the collectable is not int ones present in the key
      IllegalArgumentException - if tries to set a collectable to less than 0

      public Placement getPlacementAt(Position position)
      Parameters:
      position - is the position of the placement to get
      Returns:
      the placement at a certain position, null if there is no placement at that position
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the position is null

    • playCard

      public void playCard(Placement placement)
      method that 1) adds the placement to the placement history if valid 2) update the frontier 3) calculate and updates the consequences given a placement
      Parameters:
      placement - contains the card to be played
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if placement == null
